auth.consentLabel: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
auth.consentNotice: By signing up, you accept the <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: We'll email you a link to reset your password.
auth.resetLinkSent: Password reset link sent. Check your inbox.
auth.resetLinkError: We couldn't send the reset link. Please try again.
auth.resetPasswordSubtitle: Choose a new password for your account.
auth.resetPasswordSuccessDescription: Your password has been changed. You can sign in now.
auth.resetLinkInvalidDescription: This reset link is invalid or has expired.
auth.canvasSubtitle: Build your AI-assisted WhatsApp workflow in minutes, not days.
auth.canvasPrompt: I want to book an appointment
auth.canvasScenario1Turn1User: Can I book a skincare appointment this week?
auth.canvasScenario1Turn1Agent: Yes, we have available slots this week. Which day works for you?
auth.canvasScenario1Turn2User: Wednesday evening works, can you reserve my spot?
auth.canvasScenario1Turn2Agent: Absolutely. I can reserve Wednesday evening. Please share your name and phone number.
auth.canvasScenario2Turn1User: Can you resend the receipt from my previous appointment?
auth.canvasScenario2Turn1Agent: Sure, I can forward this as a support request right away.
auth.canvasScenario2Turn2User: I do not need a new booking, only the document.
auth.canvasScenario2Turn2Agent: Understood. Your request has been forwarded to the support team.
auth.canvasScenario3Turn1User: We need an office team photo shoot for our company.
auth.canvasScenario3Turn1Agent: Great fit. We provide on-site corporate shooting and planning.
auth.canvasScenario3Turn2User: Can we schedule a planning call this week?
auth.canvasScenario3Turn2Agent: Yes, we can schedule it this week. Share your company email and I will send the details today.
auth.canvasSequence1Agent: Great fit. We have Starter and Pro packages. Want me to recommend the best one by budget?
auth.canvasSequence2Agent: Yes. We have 3 slots this week. Share your preferred day and I will reserve it.
auth.canvasSequence3User: Do you have a first-visit offer?
auth.canvasSequence3Agent: Yes. First visit gets 10% off. I can secure it now with your name and phone number.

simulator.title: Simulator
simulator.description: Test your bot in a realistic environment. Messages here are not saved.
simulator.emptyChatNotice: Start a new conversation to test how your assistant responds.
simulator.sensitivityHint:
Low = More creative/flexible
High = More strict/precise
simulator.emptyDebug: Send a message to see how the bot works.

General.title: General Settings
General.languageDescription: Select your preferred language for the interface.

Channels.title: Channels
Channels.noOrganizationDesc: You need to be part of an organization to manage channels.
Channels.description: Connect messaging platforms to start receiving leads into your inbox.
Channels.whatsappComingSoon: WhatsApp integration coming soon! Contact support for early access.
Channels.confirmDisconnectDesc: Are you sure you want to disconnect this channel? The bot will stop responding to messages.
Channels.connectTelegramHelpTitle: How to get your Bot Token:

connectTelegramSteps.step2: Send <newbot>/newbot</newbot> to create a new bot
connectTelegramSteps.step3: Copy the API token that looks like <tokenFormat>123456:ABC...</tokenFormat>

Channels.oauthConnectDescription: You'll be redirected to Meta to authorize this channel connection. After approval, you'll return here automatically.

connectWhatsAppSteps.step1: Create a WhatsApp app in Meta Developers and copy the Phone Number ID + Business Account ID.
connectWhatsAppSteps.step2: Generate a permanent access token with WhatsApp messaging permissions.
connectWhatsAppSteps.step3: Set an app secret and verify token. Use the same verify token in the webhook configuration.

connectInstagramSteps.step1: Connect your Instagram professional account to a Facebook Page and enable Instagram Messaging API access in Meta App settings.
connectInstagramSteps.step2: Copy the Page ID and Instagram Business Account ID, then generate a Page Access Token with messaging permissions.
connectInstagramSteps.step3: Set an app secret and verify token. Use the same verify token in Meta webhook configuration.

billingPlans.description: Manage your trial/premium status and credit purchase actions.
billingPlans.noOrganizationDesc: You need to be part of an organization to manage plans.

status.title: Current Plan Status
status.description: Plan state and conversion context. Detailed usage history is in Usage & Billing.
status.lockRuleTrial: Trial usage is locked when trial time or trial credits run out first.
status.lockRulePremium: Top-up is available only after premium package credits are exhausted.
status.structureHint: This page is for plan state and purchase actions.
status.nonActiveMembershipNote: Subscription is not active. Use the action center below to continue.
status.topupBlocked: Top-up is blocked until premium + package exhaustion.

aiSettings.title: AI Settings
aiSettings.description: Tune how the bot responds when it can’t find a Skill or Knowledge Base match.
aiSettings.botModeDescription: Applies to Telegram/WhatsApp/Instagram. Simulator is unaffected.
aiSettings.botModeActiveDescription: Bot replies to messages (Skills → KB → fallback).
aiSettings.botModeOffDescription: No AI processing; only messages are stored.
aiSettings.operatorLeadExtractionDescription: Control whether lead extraction continues when an operator takes over.
aiSettings.operatorLeadExtractionLabel: Keep lead extraction running during operator takeover
aiSettings.operatorLeadExtractionHelp: Replies remain disabled; only lead extraction runs.
aiSettings.humanEscalationDescription: Configure automatic escalation and skill-triggered handover.
aiSettings.humanEscalationStepSkillDescription: If a skill requires human handover, the system always switches to operator and sends the bot message.
aiSettings.hotLeadScoreHelp: Escalate when lead extraction score is this value or higher.
aiSettings.humanEscalationActionNotifyOnlyHelp: Notify the team and keep AI active.
aiSettings.humanEscalationActionSwitchOperatorHelp: Lock conversation to operator and pause AI replies.
aiSettings.humanEscalationMessageHelp: Shown for the active UI language (English/Turkish) and used for skill-triggered handover.
aiSettings.botNameDescription: Shown to users and used in AI responses.
aiSettings.thresholdDescription: Applies to both Skills and Knowledge Base matching. Higher = stricter match (fewer replies). Lower = looser match (more replies).
aiSettings.promptDescription: If no Skill or Knowledge Base match is found, the bot will respond using the prompt below.
aiSettings.saveError: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
aiSettings.noOrganizationDesc: You need to be part of an organization to manage AI settings.
aiSettings.offeringProfileDescription: Summarize what you offer so lead extraction can match fit even without a catalog.

organizationSettings.description: Manage your organization profile and defaults.
organizationSettings.nameDescription: Shown to your team and in shared views.
organizationSettings.aiControlDescription: When enabled, both the offering profile and required fields are generated and updated from AI suggestions.

organizationSettings.offeringProfileItemsAddPlaceholder: Type an offering detail and press Enter
organizationSettings.offeringProfilePlaceholder: Example: We provide newborn shoots, maternity sessions, and family packages. We do not offer individual headshots.
organizationSettings.offeringProfileAiToggleHelp: When enabled, the system generates new service suggestions from your Skills and Knowledge Base content.
organizationSettings.offeringProfileManualAddHelp: This text is stored as a separate profile note. It does not become a suggestion card.
organizationSettings.requiredFieldsDescription: The bot will ask for missing details from this list.
organizationSettings.requiredFieldsPlaceholder: Add a required field and press Enter
organizationSettings.requiredFieldsHelp: Example: desired date, budget, pet breed, buyer/seller
organizationSettings.requiredFieldsAiToggleHelp: When enabled, AI-generated required fields are shown with an AI tag.
organizationSettings.requiredFieldsManualAddPlaceholder: Type a required field and press Enter
organizationSettings.offeringProfileSuggestionsNote: Suggestions update as you add or edit documents.
organizationSettings.offeringProfileSuggestionsGenerateEmpty: No new suggestions generated. Check your Skills or Knowledge Base content.
organizationSettings.offeringProfileSuggestionsEmptyPendingDe: New suggestions will appear here for review.
organizationSettings.offeringProfileSuggestionsEmptyApprovedD: Approve suggestions to use them in lead extraction.
organizationSettings.offeringProfileSuggestionsEmptyArchivedD: Archived suggestions are kept for audit and are excluded from AI context.
